name: Cheese Quest (TimeForCrab64)
description:
Play as Vinny, a mouse with a love for adventure, as he explores the world in search of cheese!

-- Controls --

  • WASD / Arrow Keys to move
  • W / Up Arrow to enter doors
  • S / Down Arrow to fall through certain platforms
  • K / Space Bar to Jump
  • L / LShift to Dash and use abilities
  • Press Enter to pause the game

This game is currently in early development, so there is a lot of content still to come.

  • Play as Vinny the mouse!
  • Explore 8 distinct levels, with themes such as a haunted house and a snowy tundra
  • Uncover secret areas in each level for bonus challenges
  • Utilise objects in each level to gain new abilities, including a pet pigeon to fly and a speeding mine cart!
  • Collect cheese to increase your score

More levels and bosses will be added in the future so stay tuned for more!
